page.title: 15BRUNEL UNIVERSITY
page.content: {BRUNEL UNIVERSITY (founded 1966)} In June some St.Laurence pupils went to Brunel University,named after Isambard Brunel,the famous engineer .Mr.Mander,(Schools' liaison officer ),showed us around the campus .As you enter the University you will find shops, a bank,a travel agency and a supermarket.We found out that 5 students shared a flat,each flat having a toilet and shower.The University provides places for 3000 students,many being on sandwich courses. Not all their time is spent studying,for the University has a large sports complex.The centre has a rock climbing wall,nets for cricket and courts for basketball,squash, badminton,volleyball,five side football etc.There is even a weight training area.A floodlit all weather surface provides for outside sport.
